title: Did a black teenager ask to be tried as a white man?
subtitle: It appears that an unreliable website with a tendency to publish squirrel and refill the irony fooled readers in the summer of 2020.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In 2020, a 19-year-old black man, Sean Jackson, requested that he be tried "as a white man" in a court in Tampa, Florida.
